timeline.message: Add bootstrap check for disabled bytecode verification

timeline.bodyText:
[question] so the current state here is that those JVM versions are not supported out of the box in JavaVersionBootstrapCheck, but just in case the bootstraps checks are disabled we still apply the startup delay.
Would it make sense to have all those per-version checks all done in JavaVersionBootstrapCheck so that everything that is related to JVM version is within the same class ? (Might be enough as static method though).
timeline.author: SylvainJuge
SylvainJuge
